Row.Text: Welcome to Teotihuacan, the city of the Pyramids of the Sun and the Moon. Respect my power, and be welcome.
Our temples shall still be standing when your name has been lost to time.
I would say you'll live to regret this, but that would be a lie, because you will not live.
I think you can work with me.
Let the atlatl of fear strike your hearts, for I am coming for you.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])

You are a disappointment. I shall have you taken to our temples in chains, and it's nothing less than you deserve.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
Your cities will make a fine addition to my empire with my son on their thrones.
Do you really think your idle threats make me fear you in any way whatsoever? Pathetic.
Our people are now building Boulevards of the Dead and wearing war goggles. I worry the rest of the world will succumb to the influence of your culture.
I see that your people are now Boulevards of the Dead and wearing war goggles. This is excellent.
